title: Our Revolution is NOT COMMUNIST, our Revolution is HUMANIST (Cuban stamp, ca. 1959)
Text:: Our Revolution is NOT COMMUNIST, our Revolution is HUMANIST. The Cubans only want the right to an education, the right to work, the right to eat without fear, the right to PEACE, JUSTICE, FREEDOM.
Additional information:: This Cuban stamp was issued shortly after the Cuban Revolution as a propaganda initiative. Produced as a cinderella (i.e. unofficial) stamp to be stuck to US-bound mail.
